metadata.title: CVE-2024-38809 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Applications that parse ETags from "If-Match" or "If-None-Match" requestheaders are vulnerable to DoS attack.Users of affected versions should upgrade to the corresponding fixedversion.Users of older, unsupported versions could enforce a size limit on"If-Match" and "If-None-Match" headers, e.g. through a Filter.

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
